Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{1: 'Constellia Central Street'}
{3: 'Your terminal casts a crystal-blue glow, and the interface lingers on your chat with Teddy. The last message reads, "Meet at 3 PM, same place."'}
{3: "You glance at the clock—it's already 3:12 PM."}
{3: 'You and Teddy have a deal: if either of you is more than ten minutes late, you have to grant the other a favor—unless you can come up with a reason the other accepts.'}
{3: 'You still recall how you were late once before because your meeting ran long. After some thorough logic, Teddy insisted you could have made it on time anyway. And then...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory546.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Come and be my model for half the day. I've been experimenting with a few outfit combos, and I really want to see how they look on you.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'Now, you finally get your chance.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You hear those familiar footsteps approaching and look up. The pink-haired Construct comes to a stop right in front of you.'}
{3: "She's here. Knowing Teddy as well as you do, you're sure she's about to claim she was forced by circumstances beyond her control—probably with some creative excuses."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "The traffic is terrible, so I'm late.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The first thing you will do is root out any twisted arguments lurking in here...'}
{2: "You're actually admitting it just like that?!", 3: '34', 4: 'Who are you? Where are you hiding Teddy?', 5: '34'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "You're totally overreacting.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'm just not in the mood to argue with you about this today.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You notice Teddy's voice is a bit deeper and more earnest than usual."}
{2: 'Is something going on?', 3: '39', 4: "I see. It's because of the Double Seventh Festival.", 5: '44'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Go on, take a guess.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Guess right, and you get a reward. Guess wrong, and you face a penalty.', 4: '1'}
{2: "So I'm not getting out of this, am I?", 3: '44'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Hmm... maybe it's the festival spirit getting to me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "But, that's not the whole story...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Teddy murmurs, then opens and closes her mouth. It's obvious she wants to say more, but the words never come."}
{3: 'She lowers her head, gazing at her toes, and seems a little... shy?'}
{3: 'After a moment, she looks up and meets your gaze.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Can you come with me somewhere?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory677.jpg'}

{3: 'In this cool, secluded garden, lush greenery thrives. At the center stands an ancient tree, its golden leaves gleaming in the sunlight. Occasionally, a soft breeze drifts through, knocking a few leaves loose.'}

{3: 'You catch a falling leaf, cool against your palm. On one side is a vivid image of the cowherd, the weaver girl, and their magpie bridge—reminding you that neither the leaf nor the tree is natural, but an exquisitely crafted work of art.'}
{3: 'Many couples are strolling in, their hands tightly clasped as they quietly gaze at the towering tree.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'This is the Double Seventh Magpie Tree.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if she wants to blend into the mood, she speaks in a hushed tone.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Commandant, do you know this place is called the "date sanctuary" of the Double Seventh Festival park?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Legend says that if two people sincerely share what's in their hearts under this tree, the magpies will bless them, ensuring they stay happy and together forever.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'It sounds so romantic.', 4: '...'}
{3: "Teddy takes a deep breath, as though she's mustering her courage."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Commandant, there's something I need to tell you.", 4: '1'}
{3: "This setting, this mood, and Teddy's uncharacteristic bashfulness..."}
{3: 'Could it be...?'}
{2: 'This is way too sudden!', 3: '77', 4: 'Give me a second to prepare.', 5: '77', 6: '...', 7: '77'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's hard to explain right now, so...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She takes a portable player and earphones from her pocket and hands them over with both hands.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've already recorded it.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You take the portable music player, wondering if Teddy's message is hidden inside."}
{3: 'You put the earphones in and meet her gaze. She nods gently.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "At first, there's only silence—then the music starts flowing."}
{3: 'It begins with the piano, soft and ethereal. Though the melody is simple, it never feels dull. Gradually, Kowloong instruments weave in, taking the piece to new heights.'}
{3: "Modern and traditional elements blend, as if neon magpies appear in the sky to form a magpie bridge. Two souls, perfectly in tune, hold each other's hands on that bridge."}
{3: 'Emotions rise steadily, heading toward a climax. Right before they explode, everything suddenly stops. And then...'}
{3: 'Then... nothing...'}
{3: "It's over?"}
{3: "It seems to be over. There's no more sound after that."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory677.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory677.jpg'}
{2: 'The music sounds great...', 3: '102', 4: "So... that's it?", 5: '102'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Ahem... So here's the situation.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Teddy', 3: "You've probably seen the Double Seventh Festival promo video. There's a section where modern instruments play alongside traditional Kowloong instruments, which I find really fascinating.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I watch it and try to replicate the performance, but I can never quite capture the core feeling. Right now, the best track I've managed to create is the one you're hearing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It might sound decent at first, but when you listen more carefully, you can tell it's missing that spark that truly brings it to life.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Teddy's mouth gradually curls into a subtle smile."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'After analyzing it, I find that the heart of this melody lies in a strong sense of "attachment."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "So I'm asking you, Commandant, to help me set the right mood. With your cooperation, I think I can fully grasp this tune and finish the piece.", 4: '1'}
{3: "In the end, that evil grin reappears on the pink-haired Construct's face, as though it never truly left."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Oh? Commandant, you looked a little tense just now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Were you expecting something?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I knew it'd turn out like this.", 3: '116', 4: 'That act of yours was pretty convincing...', 5: '116', 6: '...', 7: '116'}
{3: "As though she's satisfied with your reaction, Teddy beams with delight."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'But it surely is helpful, heh-heh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "That's the exact vibe I'm going for. Mhm, I'll just tweak this part right here...", 4: '1'}
{3: "She hums a melody as she opens her terminal's projection, brings up the score, makes a quick edit, then exports the audio and loads it into her music player."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Let's head out, Commandant. We're moving on to the next spot.", 4: '1'}
{2: "We're leaving? We just got here to see the tree, and it's already over?", 3: '128'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's definitely not over...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy shares the wired earphones with you.'}
{3: 'She hits the play button, and the newly adjusted melody begins to flow softly.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's not finished yet. A half-done song like this won't receive the magpies' blessing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Let's come here again when it's done.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "When that time comes, I'll let you hear the voice in my heart.", 4: '1'}
